name: STAR POWER (Retr0Magn3tic)
description:
All you do is defeat stars that are bigger than you in hopes of destroying the hierarchy that dominates the galaxy. Sounds easy-ish right? However, because of your small size, you must complete this task without taking a hit. Think it is still easy, try for yourself!

I do hope you guys like this game, and not rage.

(This game might not be hard for some people so if it seems like I'm tooting my own horn on difficulty it's because I am.)

Week #135-Shooting Stars - Star Power

Title Screen art made with FireAlpaca

Music made with FL Studio Mobile

Sad pixel art done with Piskel

All done by Retr0Magn3tic!
